story.title: Schools on the Line January 5, 2012
story.description: WBEZ's Schools on the Line @AskBrizard call in show. 01/05/2012 7pm Much more discussion in the live online chat here: http://www.wbez.org/story/januarys-schools-line-95312

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

quote.text: Tomorrow's the 1st Thurs of '12, which means it's time for @AskBrizard on @WBEZ. Tune in at 7pm & dial 312-923-9239 to ask a question.

meta.text: Tomorrow's the 1st Thurs of '12, which means it's time for @AskBrizard on @WBEZ. Tune in at 7pm & dial 312-923-9239 to ask a question.

quote.text: Live @WBEZ chat online during @AskBrizard here: http://ow.ly/8jPG9

meta.text: Live @WBEZ chat online during @AskBrizard here: http://t.co/aZexbmZm

quote.text: Starting off with IG report. Brizard says he gets reports. Me: How frequently? Why are they not posted online? @AskBrizard

meta.text: Starting off with IG report. Brizard says he gets reports. Me: How frequently? Why are they not posted online? @AskBrizard

quote.text: Q on culture of testing. Brizard: Testing can be good part of curriculum if done well. Says CPS over tests right now. #AskBrizard

meta.text: Q on culture of testing. Brizard: Testing can be good part of curriculum if done well. Says CPS over tests right now. #AskBrizard

quote.text: Brizard claims they have reduced some testing. Have they? Anyone know? #AskBrizard

meta.text: Brizard claims they have reduced some testing. Have they? Anyone know? #AskBrizard

quote.text: There are some great questions being asked in the live online chat. http://ow.ly/8jPG9 #AskBrizard

meta.text: There are some great questions being asked in the live online chat. http://t.co/aZexbmZm #AskBrizard

quote.text: Brizard- Would like all teachers trained on sensitivity issues and LGBT issues. #AskBrizard

meta.text: Brizard- Would like all teachers trained on sensitivity issues and LGBT issues. #AskBrizard

quote.text: @AskBrizard Call CPS about food & get trsferd to Chartwells which doesn't announce itself as a food vendor. Is nutrition dept privatized?

meta.text: @AskBrizard Call CPS about food & get trsferd to Chartwells which doesn't announce itself as a food vendor. Is nutrition dept privatized?

quote.text: Brizard is drowning on this Dyett question #AskBrizard

meta.text: Brizard is drowning on this Dyett question #AskBrizard

quote.text: Brizard can't even answer a simple EpiPen Q tonight. If this was baseball the manager be bringing in a relief pitcher. #AskBrizard

meta.text: Brizard can't even answer a simple EpiPen Q tonight. If this was baseball the manager be bringing in a relief pitcher. #AskBrizard

quote.text: Parent letter about Dyett that earlier caller talked about. http://ow.ly/8jRBH #AskBrizard

meta.text: Parent letter about Dyett that earlier caller talked about. http://t.co/HLUUygec #AskBrizard

quote.text: @shua123 -- Here's what prompted my Dyett question. http://www.huffingtonpost.com/matt-farmer/one-public-schools-death-_b_1124719.html

meta.text: @shua123 -- Here's what prompted my Dyett question. http://t.co/SiNIneES

quote.text: Teacher- "35 students, no air conditioning." Air conditioning seems like an issue that shouldn't be so hard to solve. #AskBrizard

meta.text: Teacher- "35 students, no air conditioning." Air conditioning seems like an issue that shouldn't be so hard to solve. #AskBrizard

quote.text: Loving Brizard on @wbez. #askbrizard

meta.text: Loving Brizard on @wbez. #askbrizard

quote.text: @wbez: On air conditioning question, if u can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen. Its about the kids, not u. #askBrizard

meta.text: @wbez: On air conditioning question, if u can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen. Its about the kids, not u. #askBrizard

quote.text: @phoebeharlan What about the kids that can't stand the heat? #AskBrizard

meta.text: @phoebeharlan What about the kids that can't stand the heat? #AskBrizard

quote.text: I'm curious if any teacher has ever tried to bring in his/her own window or portable air conditioner and if that was allowed.

meta.text: I'm curious if any teacher has ever tried to bring in his/her own window or portable air conditioner and if that was allowed.

quote.text: @shua123 I did when I taught summer school last year. U really need 4 per room to make a difference. mine set on high and neverwas below 88

meta.text: @shua123 I did when I taught summer school last year. U really need 4 per room to make a difference. mine set on high and neverwas below 88

quote.text: And the end of the hour. Great discussion happening in the live online chat though. #AskBrizard

meta.text: And the end of the hour. Great discussion happening in the live online chat though. #AskBrizard

quote.text: Thanks for your questions for @AskBrizard Schools on the Line! We're about to wrap things up.

meta.text: Thanks for your questions for @AskBrizard Schools on the Line! We're about to wrap things up.
